autosplitter_send_igt_desc: When splitting, sends the in-game heist time as game time. You need to configure LiveSplit to show game time
autosplitter_igt_on_restarts_desc: Update the game time on restarts and fails
autosplitter_round_igt_desc: Round Game Time like shown in Crew Stats
autosplitter_action_menu_desc: Action when entering main menu state, i.e. the state before a heist is startet
autosplitter_action_waiting_for_players_: Action when entering the waiting menu, where you can select you loadout and preplan
